About Us ‚Äì Chive Media Group About Us Press Brand Guidelines Careers Contact Us Press & media inquiries? Contact us here. About Us How a couple brothers started a global movement Play video Close The Founders Leo Resig CEO & Co-Founder Leo Resig CEO & Co-Founder Family has always come first with Leo. A proud father to a beautiful daughter, Paris and his amazing wife, Tiffany. Hailing from Fort Wayne, Indiana, Leo Resig is the second of four children. He has an older brother, John, who is the co-founder and business partner in Chive Media Group. He also has two younger sisters, Emily and Megan who run theCHIVE‚Äôs sister destination, TheBerry.com. Leo‚Äôs parents instilled a work ethic at a young age and they found child labor loopholes for him to caddy at the tender age of 13. He has since had over 50 jobs where he learned what he loved but mostly what he did not. His array of experience swayed him to be an entrepreneur and control his own destiny. He learned the facts of life through some startup failures but has always lived life with his blinders off and considers himself a futurist and a generally lucky dude. He is famous for having at least one bad idea every day. A graduate of Indiana University‚Äôs with a SPEA degree in Management in 2003, Leo learned nothing about business. His post college professional careers consisted of a bartender, server, screenplay writer and a personal banker at Wells Fargo. It wasn‚Äôt until he moved to LA in 2005 where he landed a job as an office manager at a creative agency in Hollywood that he got the bug for digital advertising. He was promoted to the company‚Äôs first Ad Ops manager of their newly established digital media department where he learned there was more to online advertising than pop up ads. His job at the agency led him to another adops job at Gorilla Nation (now Evolve Media), on the publisher side. This is where Leo learned how websites were monetized. At the tail end of his tenure at Gorilla Nation, Leo and his brother John started a celebrity gossip blog, Derober.com to capitalize on the celeb gossip trend. At the same time, Leo transferred from Venice Beach to Chicago with Gorilla Nation to find a nice midwestern girl to settle down with (which he did). John and Leo quickly realized they hated celebrity gossip and found themselves constantly cruising foreign viral photo blogs for a quick laugh. So they switched gears and started a photo blog in November 2008 as a one stop shop for curated viral photos in long scroll gallery form. With Leo living in Chicago and John living in Venice, they combined the CHI from Chicago and VE from Venice to form theCHIVE.com. (Fun fact, theCHIVE was almost named DarbyGunpowder.com) It was an instant hit and Leo moved back to Venice to build the business with John. Their first hire was their cousin Bob who they saved from his serving career at CPK. It started as two brothers blogging on the couch, drinking beer with Top Gear playing in the background. Chive Media Group has grown to nearly 100 employees strong with a thriving e-comm business, nationwide beer line, a multi-city music festival and a charity that has raised millions of dollars and changed hundreds of peoples lives. Leo and his family now reside in Austin, TX where they relocated the company from Venice in August, 2013. Close John Resig President & Co-Founder John Resig President & Co-Founder John Resig is the co-owner and President, and I use the title loosely, of theCHIVE.com and TheBerry.com and is the oldest and most immature Resig, which says a lot. John lives in here in paradise (Venice, CA) with his idiot cousin, Rick. If John ever turns up dead, Rick did it. John landed the role of Deputy Kevin Ellis on the hit HBO vampire drama, True Blood, in 2008. He is currently filming the 3rd season and, yes, it‚Äôs totally badass. John thinks he‚Äôs Peter Pan and has no plans to leave an emotional state exceeding that of a college Freshman, ever. Close On the first day... Brothers John Resig and Leo Resig founded Chive Media Group and its flagship site, theCHIVE.com,
						in
						November 2008 with no capital and a lot of hustle. Leo was living in Chicago (CHI) and John was
						living in Venice (VE) and that‚Äôs how theCHIVE was born. More than a decade later, theCHIVE has
						evolved into a one-of-its-kind lifestyle brand with a variety of business lines including
						digital
						media, e-commerce, community building, and charity. Chive Media Group currently has 40+
						employees
						headquartered in Austin, TX. In 2014, John and Leo and their CMG executive team pioneered CHIVE TV, single-handedly creating
						the
						streaming TV-for-business category. This led them to create Atmosphere, the world‚Äôs first and
						only
						streaming platform for businesses. Atmosphere can be seen on televisions in over 50,000
						businesses
						worldwide and continues to grow its global footprint rapidly. Chive Media Group Empire Sitemap About Us Press Brand Guidelines Careers Contact Us Our Properties theCHIVE CHIVE TV theCHIVERY CHIVE Charities Buy me Brunch William Murray Golf TERMS OF USE ‚Ä¢ COPYRIGHT
			¬© 2025 CHIVE MEDIA GROUP, LLC. ALL RIGHTS
			RESERVED

Learn why 88% of clients recommend our services. Try vChief for 20 hours, risk-free‚Äîwith any new engagement. Love our support, or your money back. Talent Matching Within one week, we recommend 2 to 5 candidates from our network of 400+ leaders whose skill sets and industry expertise meet your needs. vChief works with and recruits remote candidates. ÔÉÄ 3. Candidate Selection You interview your top 2 or 3 candidates with no obligation to sign a contract. Selected candidates can start within 2 weeks. Meet Our Talent Positioning Leaders for Success Everywhere Get Fractional Leadership with Measurable ROI Chief of Staff | Community Development Nonprofit Secured nearly $8M in funding to attract tens of millions in private investment for small businesses in the US‚Äôs most impoverished county‚Äîa 4,794% ROI Associate Chief of Staff | Professional Services Supported a co-founder with 10 hours/week during a leader‚Äôs parental leave freed up the co-founder‚Äôs time to focus on sales, leading to $50K in closed deals Chief of Staff | Charter School Drove 12,505% ROI by exceeding the ambitious enrollment target, resulting in $4.8M in additional revenue in less than 7 months Chief of Staff | Community Development Nonprofit Hired, onboarded, and mentored over 10 new team members Chief Operating Officer | Political Organization Realized $200K in cost savings and increased efficiency by driving change management during a transition period, implementing collective bargaining, new contracts, and HR systems This help is ridiculously good. Very high quality. My chief of staff Kara has a great willingness to do anything, provide advice as a thought partner, and get involved and invested to the level she feels like a teammate. I just wish I had even more of her time. I love working with her and regularly recommend vChief services to other leaders I know. - Akshai Patel CEO, Phoenix Collegiate Academy Alissa was a joy to work with. Her work ethic and expertise was invaluable to the organization as we navigated staffing and programming changes emerging out of the pandemic. - Nicole Hebert Operations Manager, Davis Art Center Alexis was amazing. She quickly got up to speed and added value across many different areas. Her project management and people skills allowed her to quickly build trust across the org and become a seamless member of the team. - Debra Kurshan Chief Operating Officer, Propel America Due to her strong skills and experience, Brenda was able to quickly assess our needs and offer deliverables to meet our needs. She was a delight to work with and very supportive. - Yvonne Campbell Therapist, ZoeRVA Health vChief has been a vital source of talent for chief of staff needs for our organization. The chiefs of staff we have worked with have all brought expertise and commitment to advancing our work and culture. We would not be making the progress we are in our mission or in our organization without this support! - Joe Doctor Chief Operating Officer, National Board of Teaching Professionals The vChief Client Success team is highly professional, efficient, and responsive, providing us with invaluable insights and strategic guidance. I highly recommend VChief to any organization looking to enhance their executive capabilities and achieve their goals more effectively. - Olu Ibrahim Founder and President, Kids In Tech Yinnie is a true professional, she was systematic in her approach to her projects, communicative every step of the way, and thoughtful both about what she was proposing and my ability to implement her recommendations across the organization. I would highly recommend her work, and that of vChief, to others! - Sara Bokhari Chief Operating Officer, Build.Excel.Sustain vChief‚Äôs HR consulting services have been a game-changer for our organization. Their expertise in strategic planning, employee engagement, and talent management has transformed our HR processes, making them more efficient and effective. The vChief team brought a wealth of knowledge and customized solutions that addressed our unique challenges, resulting in improved employee satisfaction and retention. Their proactive and professional approach has not only helped us navigate complex HR issues but also fostered a positive and productive workplace culture. We highly recommend vChief to any organization seeking top-notch HR consulting services. - Erol Yildirim Chief Operating Officer, The Center for Regional Economic Competitiveness (CREC) Our vChiefs deep knowledge of operations and know-how in growing businesses were impressive to experience. She listened well, asked clarifying questions and got to work quickly. She produced actionable ideas, frameworks and insights to help us gain clarity on what we wanted and/or needed to do. Where she didn‚Äôt have direct experience, she was thorough and timely with research to provide data or contacts for support. Our vChief was easy to work with, kept communication lines open and ensured our needs were met. She exceeded our expectations, and we are grateful for her partnership. - Christine Noffz Founder, BenchStrength Coaching, LLC Kerry was fantastic. We easily got on a productive and efficient cadence. She seamlessly jumped into our workflow given her extensive background in the field, and her senior leadership experience. In addition to all of the technical and operational support, Kerry also served as a senior advisor to me, supporting strategic decision-making. 10/10 overall! - Andrea Zayas Executive Director, Journey into Education & Teaching Brittany was incredible! She first supported us as part of the pro-bono project, and we continued working with her beyond this timeframe because she added so much value to our small and growing non-profit. She was incredibly meticulous, a powerful thought partner, and she was able to foresee challenges and find solutions. - Priya Iyer Founder & CEO, Our Roots vChief set me free to be the start-up entrepreneur I needed to be in a fast paced logistics & supply chain industry. My chief of staff was able to help build the behind the scenes strategy and execute on key processes (payroll, scheduling, employee relations, etc.) so that I could be the outward face of the organization. Our launch at Stubbs Logistics simply wouldn‚Äôt have been as successful without Alex. - Dr. Annis Stubbs Founder & CEO, Stubbs Logistics I can not say enough positive things about the experience of working with vChief! OPEN Madison ‚Äì Out Professional Engagement Network was so fortunate to have been awarded this pro bono service program! This has been a game changer for us! To everyone at vChief, we have not taken this opportunity for granted and we thank you for your confidence in us! I don‚Äôt know what I am going to do w/o our CoS, who is the most amazingness of all! We appreciate you! - Heidi Duss Board President, OPEN My vChief has helped me to be able to breathe and then accomplish a variety of strategic business development goals that I have been putting off for years! Very different than a subcontractor accomplishing tasks, I feel like I have a strategic partner invested in my business‚Äô growth. - Deb Hanmer Breakthrough Leadership Consulting The SkillUp leadership team likes to debate and ponder, deliberately. But decision making has occasionally proven slow and cumbersome, because no one individual was coordinating and facilitating across all of SkillUp‚Äôs work streams. Edith helped us to coordinate in a much more effective manner, which allowed us to make decisions quickly and with more clarity. It‚Äôs been a huge benefit to the organization. We‚Äôve loved having Edith on the team. She‚Äôs a quick learner, and after only a couple of months part time, has already provided tremendous value. - Steven Lee Executive Director Working with Meghan has been great, she‚Äôs helped us create our Board Charter and build out our Strategic Plan both have been a huge help. Meghan has been a sounding board for me and I think we collaborate really well together. - Jessica Hatem Executive Director Kate consistently takes projects on from start to finish, ensuring completion, with very little direction. I can turn projects over to her and she runs with them, freeing up my time considerably and taking items off of my plate. She is also a valued team member and has taken the time to get to know each of the work styles of all of the members of our team. - Jessica de Barros Education - Charter Schools, Washington State Charter School Commission Jenn was a huge asset to me personally and to TFA Baltimore during a period of transition between Chiefs of Staff. She was incredibly fast at getting up to speed on context and building relationships and able to add value almost immediately. I was so grateful to have her support during a critical period for our organization and team. - Courtney Cass Executive Director, Teach For America Baltimore Our consultant from vChief has brought valuable experience and perspectives, enabling me to handoff key projects with confidence. - Monisha Kapila Co-CEO, Pro-Inspire I was often told that if I got a Chief of Staff my life would change, but now I know it from experience. My days are spent the way a CEO should spend them now, and our business is booked farther in advance then we ever had bookings before. We‚Äôre a more efficient, well-run business because of her addition. - Heather Mason Founder & CEO, Caspian Agency vChief matched us with executive strategy support and thought partnership that has added significant capacity to our leadership team. - Elissa Salas CEO, College Track Not Sure What Support You Need? Let our team of expert business consultants uncover the perfect solution for your unique pain points. In your complimentary needs assessment, we‚Äôll evaluate which role will best meet your needs. Need some peace of mind? Every new engagement includes 20 hours, risk-free. Love our support, or your money back. We are REAL-LIFE, BREATHING, HUMAN BEINGS who live theCHIVE culture. We're here to answer your questions as quickly as possible ¬†‚Äî within 24 hours! ‚Äî¬†and do so with a smile and an ol' spring in our step. Because we understand regular office hours can be limiting (bosses, amiright?), we offer a ton of ways to get in touch. MEET THE TEAM! Patrick ‚ÄúPatty‚Äù McManis is Director of Customer Experience. Blessed with the best customer service team in the business, he has been with theCHIVE for almost 5 years and has seen just about everything. Patrick wants to be a beekeeper on Venus when/if he retires. Patrick‚Äôs Favorite Tee: Beer Hunt Tee Jessica is a veteran of the customer service industry having worked and managed multiple customer service departments over the years. Her experience and expertise are unmatched in the industry! Jessica‚Äôs Favorite Tee: Whiskey Made Me Do It Kyle is another veteran of the customer service industry. Personable and friendly, Kyle is always here to help a customer with any questions they may have. Kyle is also a big fan of the Chicago Cubs so if you get him on chat, make sure to say ‚ÄúGo Cubs Go!" Kyle‚Äôs Favorite Tee: Windy City Keep Calm and Chive On Chicago Emily is our customers‚Äô favorite! Chivers are always asking for Emily because of her diligence in taking care of their issues and her personable attitude. Watch out for Emily! She‚Äôs quick with the right answers and always shoots from the hip! Emily‚Äôs Favorite Tee: Polite As Fuck At the end of the day, The Chivery Customer Care team is committed to improving your experience in any way we can.
